# Load libraries

```{r}
library(R.utils)
```


# Download files

```{r}
untar("data/GSM3290896_CountTable_HBCx-22-TamR_scRNA.tar.gz", compressed="gzip", exdir="data/")
gunzip("data/GSM3290890_CountTable_HBCx-95-CapaR_scChIP_H3K27me3_mm10.txt.gz", remove=F)
```

# Read files

```{r}
test <- read.table("data/GSM3290890_CountTable_HBCx-95-CapaR_scChIP_H3K27me3_mm10.txt", header = T)
```

sessionInfo()
